name: markdown-to-html
title: Markdown to HTML Converter
description: Convert Markdown files to well-formatted HTML documents
content:
Overview

This application converts Markdown (.md) files into beautifully formatted HTML documents. The output includes proper styling for code blocks, tables, lists, and other markdown elements.

Features

  • Convert any Markdown file to a complete HTML document
  • Includes clean, readable styling
  • Supports extended markdown features (tables, code highlighting, etc.)
  • Automatic installation of dependencies

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your Markdown (.md) file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the HTML output

Output

The application generates an HTML file with the same base name as your input file (e.g., README.md becomes README.html). The HTML includes embedded CSS styling for immediate viewing in any web browser.

Use Cases

  • Converting documentation to web-viewable format
  • Creating HTML versions of README files
  • Preparing markdown content for web publishing
  • Generating styled reports from markdown notes
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$(date +%s%N)"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/markdown_to_html.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
